issue.title: Add a new resource broken
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Since 4.3.2 (I guess), when adding a new resource, the "organism" attribut is empty.

!mes-ressources.png!

Consequently, no role can be defined.



**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Works like a charms.
Thanks
